channel.title: git on David Amador
channel.description: Recent content in git on David Amador

item.title: Using Git for revision control
item.description: If you are coding, no matter what it is, games, software, websites, you should be using a code revision control of some sort. Are you using? Cool. Is it Git? Smart choice, so you probably don’t need to read the rest of this post. For the rest I’m giving some help on how to start from scratch. First of all I recommend some reading on Revision Control so that you understand what I’m talking about.

item.title: Tech Talk: Linus Torvalds On Git
item.description: I recently found that there is a subversion alternative surfacing that is in many ways much better that subversion, it name is Git and it’s a creation of Linus Torvalds. Here’s a video of him talking about it https://www.youtube.com/v/4XpnKHJAok8
